attributes.action: Extend the final voter registration date for as long as possible.
attributes.additional_details:
How thousands of people tried to register to vote last night:
https://www.gov.uk/performance/register-to-vote
attributes.background: If the final date of voter registration for the EU referendum can be extended, it should be and for as long as is feasible. The most recent debate was clearly sufficient to convince many more people to register, and this should be encouraged.

rejection.details:
Parliament agreed yesterday to a law which extended the deadline for registration. You can read the debate in the House of Commons here:

https://hansard.digiminster.com/commons/2016-06-09/debates/16060924000001/EUReferendumVoterRegistration
